promptLines: It was a dark and stormy night.

newElements.name: Character
newElements.instructions: Add another character who will drive the plot along. This could be a client asking for help, a thug trying to intimidate the protagonist, a cop demanding answers. Give a name and description and they will appear on the notepad. Then use them in the story.

newElements.name: Place
newElements.instructions: Add a place where action will occur. This could be the lobby of a hotel, an abandoned warehouse by the docks, a seedy nightclub. Give the place a name and description and it will appear on the notepad. Then use it in the story.

newElements.name: Object
newElements.instructions: Add an object that is critical to the plot. The object could be the MacGuffin that drives the story along, the clue or evidence that leads the protagonist forward, the obstacle protagonist has to overcome. Give the object a name and a description and it will appear on the notepad. Then use it in the story.

newElements.name: Protagonist
newElements.instructions: This is your main character. Give them a name and a description.

arcSegment.Exposition: This story's just starting, feel free to add new elements to build intrigue.
